sections.title: Planes Walker (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Planes Walker class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Planes Walker)
sections.description: The Planes walker gains no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Counter-Summons (Su) (Planes Walker)
sections.description: Allows using summon monster spells as counterspells against conjuration summoning effects, treating them as quickened without spell level increase.

sections.title: Planar Guide ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Planes Walker)
sections.description: Provides the choice of favored enemy (outsider subtype), favored terrain (plane), or terrain mastery benefits every three levels.

sections.title: Planar Channel (Su) (Planes Walker)
sections.description: Channels baneful energy that damages extraplanar creatures regardless of alignment, functioning like cleric channel energy but only to harm.

sections.title: Eradication (Su) (Planes Walker)
sections.description: Grants scaling bonuses to saves against outsiders and increases save DC and caster level when targeting outsiders or countering planar travel.

sections.title: Counterport (Su) (Planes Walker)
sections.description: Allows readying an action to counterspell teleportation effects within 30 feet using identical spells or higher-level conjuration spells.

sections.title: Planar Scourge (Su) (Planes Walker)
sections.description: Extraplanar creatures that fail saves against planar channel also gain panicked, sickened, or staggered condition for 1d4 rounds.

sections.title: Improved Counterport (Su) (Planes Walker)
sections.description: Upgrades counterport to redirect teleporting creatures and deal damage, plus grants attacks of opportunity against conjured creatures in threatened squares.

sections.title: Planar Purge (Su) (Planes Walker)
sections.description: Extraplanar creatures failing planar channel saves are banished to their home plane unless they have more than twice the class level in Hit Dice.

sections.title: Greater Counterport (Su) (Planes Walker)
sections.description: Allows countering teleportation as an immediate action and can recall recently teleported creatures by expending two planar channel uses.
